name: Accuship
overview: Accuship, Inc. provides transportation spend management solutions. The company focuses on contract management, shipment management, and payment management solutions. It offers shipment management products, such as AccuMove, which provides usersâ€™ employees with the ability to make service and rate comparisons using a multi carrier option, as well as offers desktop shipping, shipment management, hazardous goods, imports, and exports solutions; AccuTrade that offers international trade logistics, compliance, and content solutions; and AccuTrack, which provides basic tracking, supply chain event management, and first and last mile tracking solutions, as well as a solution for various inbound, outbound, and inter-office shipments. The company also provides payment management solutions, including AccuAudit that offers invoice processing, content validation, contract and invoice validation, routing guide compliance, loss and damage claims, small package claims, and freight claims solutions; AccuCode, which provides freight cost allocation, tolerance logic, on-line exception resolution, and information management by cost center solutions; and AccuPay that offers no float policy, escape float pitfalls, SAS70 type II certification, disbursement controls, and on-line carrier invoice review solutions. In addition, it offers information management products, which include AccuView, a reporting tool for the enterprise; and implementation, managed, and consulting services. The company serves retail, telecommunications, pharmaceutical, distribution, and banking industries. Accuship, Inc. was formerly known as Accuship.com, Inc. and changed its name to Accuship, Inc. in April 2000. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Memphis, Tennessee. As of September 30, 2006, Accuship, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Iron Data Solutions, Inc.
